name: Arktonid Republic
declaringWar: The bear wakes from his slumber and searches for food. He has found it in your lands. Prepare for war.
attacked: You will regret poking the bear!
defeated: The bear returns to his hibernation, put to rest for the time being.
introduction: The bear stirs in his sleep. It is wise to not wake him from his rest. Welcome to Arktonia, traveler.
neutralNo: Our nation cannot accept such a request.
hateHello: You have angered the bear. Be brief
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: Very well, all that fighting was getting boring anyway.
tradeRequest: We bestow you the honor of this trade offer.
